overview:
Brent Hill is the Head of Financial Services - Midwest for Google. Previously he was vice president of advertising services at FeedBurner (www.feedburner.com), the market-leading feed management provider, where he cultivates relationships with both traditional and interactive marketing agencies and corporate marketers. Prior to FeedBurner, Hill was president of Classic Kids, a national children’s portrait studio and an entrepreneur-in-residence at OCA Ventures. Prior to OCA, he held the position of executive vice president at Styleclick, a unit of Interactive Corp., where he launched and operated the multi-channel retail businesses for the NBA, NHL, PGA Tour and NASCAR. Prior to that, he served various executive roles including board member at MVP.com and Big Edge, both iInternet and catalog retailers. Hill also worked in the Technology Practice at Andersen Consulting (now Accenture).

Hill is a frequent speaker on the topic of feed advertising and his insights have been published in a variety of publications including Advertising Age, Adotas and DMNews. He received a Bachelor of Science in Finance from Bradley University and a MBA from the University of Chicago.
